Edges-Sorcerer -- Female Human Heroic Sorcerer
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Faith: (spi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Boating: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4-2 Taunt: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common; Draconic
Skill Notes:
Arcane Background (Sorcerer): Spellcasting is linked to Spirit instead of Smarts
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Advanced Arcane Bloodline: May reroll failed Spellcasting
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Bad Eyes: -1 on visual Trait rolls
Bonded Object: Gains +1 Spellcasting when bonded object is held or worn
Outsider+: -2 Persuasion (other ancestries)
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Sarenrae (Good)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (10 points): Aberrant Bloodline; Abyssal Bloodline; Advanced Bloodline; Arcane Bloodline; Arcane Mastery; Bonded Object; Celestial Bloodline; Destined Bloodline; Draconic Bloodline; Elemental Bloodline (Air); Elemental Bloodline (Earth); Elemental Bloodline (Fire); Elemental Bloodline (Water); Familiar; Favored Powers (Sorcerer); Fey Bloodline; Infernal Bloodline; New Powers; Power Points; Sorcerer; Undead Bloodline Hindrances: Bad Eyes; Pacifist; Quirk; Secret Human Abilities: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Advanced Bloodline: Has Advanced Undead Bloodline features
Advanced Celestial Bloodline: Has Flight feature
Advanced Infernal Bloodline: Has Flight feature
Advanced Undead Bloodline: Has Undead, Outsider+, and Ugly+ features
Arcane Bloodline: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Bloodline: +1 Edge Points (bloodline)
Sorcerer: Has Arcane Background (Sorcerer), Armor Interference, and Bloodline features
Advanced Destined Bloodline: +1 Benny each session
Destined Bloodline: +1 Benny each session
Outsider+: Strangers are unfriendly or hostile
Quirk: Has a minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 15 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Aberrant Bloodline: +1 Toughness
Abyssal Bloodline: +1 Toughness
Advanced Aberrant Bloodline: +1 Toughness
Draconic Bloodline: +2 Armor
Undead: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Abyssal Bloodline-1: Claws inflict d6+d4 damage/Has Resistance to electricity
Advanced Aberrant Bloodline-1: Immune to surprise and The Drop
Advanced Abyssal Bloodline: Has Resistance to cold and fire
Advanced Draconic Bloodline: Claws gain AP +2/Has Resistance to draconic energy
Advanced Elemental Bloodline (Air): R9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage 1/encounter
Advanced Elemental Bloodline (Earth): R9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage 1/encounter
Advanced Elemental Bloodline (Fire): R9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage 1/encounter
Advanced Elemental Bloodline (Water): R9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage 1/encounter
Celestial Bloodline: Has Resistance to cold and acid
Draconic Bloodline-1: Claws inflict d6+d4
Elemental Bloodline (Air): Has fly Pace 6
Elemental Bloodline (Earth): May burrow at Pace 6
Fey Bloodline: Ignores movement penalties for difficult ground/Touch inflicts Distracted
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Infernal Bloodline: Has Resistance to fire and immunity to poison
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Undead Bloodline: Has Resistance to cold/+1 on Soak attempts
Undead-1: +2 Shaken recovery/Takes no additional damage from a Called Shot/Ignores 1 point of Wound penalties/Doesn't breathe/Immune to disease and poison/Doesn't Bleed Out or heal naturally/R10" Ignores illumination penalties
Arcana
Power Count: 4 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Burst: (2 PP Evoc) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); Epic +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon)
Damage Field: (4 PP Abju) R12" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2" radius; +2 PP 2d6 damage; Epic +4 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage as heavy weapon; +2 PP Moves effect 12"/rd)
Entangle: (2 PP Tran) R12" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2/Epic +4 PP Inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Entangling material has Hardness 10)
Object Reading: (2 PP Divi) RTouch Self sees visions of the history of target (Epic +2 PP Shares vision with others nearby)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Sorcerer): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Aberrant Bloodline: Must cast Bolt, Blast, and Burst with Lingering Damage for +1 Power Point
Advanced Abyssal Bloodline: Summon Ally costs -2 Power Points/Summoned entities inflict Fear
Advanced Fey Bloodline: Power targets suffer -2 to recover
Arcane Mastery: May use Epic Power modifiers on arcane spells
Celestial Bloodline: Bolt, Blast, and Burst inflict +2 damage on evil creatures
Draconic Bloodline: +1 damage from Powers w/draconic trappings
Elemental Bloodline (Fire): Powers with fire trapping inflict +2 damage
Elemental Bloodline (Water): Powers hinder targets
Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Favored Powers (Sorcerer): Ignores 2 points of penalties when casting Bolt, Elemental Manipulation, or Protection
Infernal Bloodline: Powers with fire trapping inflict +1 damage
